Module comp310_f21_hw08_comp310_f21_hw08_36
Package provided.rmiUtils

Class RMIPortConfig

java.lang.Object
provided.config.AppConfig
provided.rmiUtils.RMIPortConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIPortConfigWithBoundName
public class RMIPortConfig extends AppConfig
An AppConfig used for holding the stub and class file server port numbers for an application instance. This class should be subclassed to create more specialized configurations that hold additional data as well as perform customizable configuration processes through invariant methods that delegate to variant strategies. Use this configuration class in conjunction with AppConfigMap<RMIPortConfig> (substitute the appropriate subclass if subclassing this class). See the READ_ME.txt file in the provided.config package for example code illustrating how to use this and other AppConfig-derived classes.
Author:
Stephen Wong

    • RMIPortConfig

      public RMIPortConfig​(String name, int stubPort, int classServerPort)
      Constructor for the configuration object
      Parameters:
      name - The name associated with this configuration. This is required by the AppConfigMap.AppConfig superclass.
      stubPort - The port to use for all RMI stubs in this configuration.
      classServerPort - The port the class file server uses in this configuration.
